item.title: Centurio: On Drivers of Multilingual Ability of Large Vision-Language Model
item.description: Centurio: a 100-language LVLMs achieves state-of-the-art multilingual performance by strategically incorporating non-English data in training, proving that multilingualism doesn’t hinder English profi…
